data.comment: The match is underway in Bremen.
Ball safe as Bremen is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 1, Frank Willenborg signals a Stuttgart throw-in in Bremen's half.
Throw-in for Bremen in their own half.
Throw-in for Bremen at Weserstadion.
In the minute 3, Throw-in for Bremen in the half of Stuttgart.
Can Bremen get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Stuttgart's half?
Throw-in Stuttgart.
In the minute 4, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Stuttgart to take a throw-in in Bremen territory.
Yuya Osako for Bremen gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 5, Stuttgart have a goal kick.
Frank Willenborg signals a free kick to Stuttgart in their own half.
Frank Willenborg signals a free kick to Bremen.
In the minute 8, Frank Willenborg signals a Stuttgart throw-in in Bremen's half.
Bremen to take a throw-in in Stuttgart territory.
Important block from the Stuttgart defence as Tahith Chong fires in a strike for Bremen.
In the minute 9, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Bremen's Theodor Gebre Selassie breaks free at Weserstadion. But the strike goes wide of the post.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Bremen.
In the minute 10, Throw-in for Bremen in the half of Stuttgart.
Can Bremen get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Stuttgart's half?
Silas Wamangituka gets his shot on target but fails to score for Stuttgart.
In the minute 15, Free kick for Bremen in their own half.
Bremen to take a throw-in in Stuttgart territory.
Throw-in for Bremen close to the penalty box.
In the minute 17, Goal kick for Stuttgart at Weserstadion.
Bremen awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Frank Willenborg awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 20, Bremen have been awarded a corner by Frank Willenborg.
Throw-in for Bremen in their own half.
Stuttgart awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 24, Ball goes out of play for a Bremen goal kick.
Stuttgart awarded a free kick in their own half.
Yuya Osako (Bremen) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
In the minute 29, Penalty! Frank Willenborg points to the spot, great chance for Stuttgart...
Goal! Stuttgart take a 0-1 lead thanks to a Silas Wamangituka spot-kick..
Throw-in for Stuttgart in the half of Bremen.
In the minute 32, In Bremen, Gonzalo Castro of Stuttgart is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Corner awarded to Stuttgart.
Corner awarded to Stuttgart.
In the minute 33, Frank Willenborg awards Bremen a goal kick.
Frank Willenborg awards the away team a throw-in.
Stuttgart needs to be cautious. Bremen have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 35, Throw-in high up the field for Bremen in Bremen.
Frank Willenborg signals a free kick to Stuttgart in their own half.
Frank Willenborg signals a free kick to Bremen just outside Stuttgart's area.
In the minute 36, Konstantinos Mavropanos for Stuttgart has been booked by Frank Willenborg and receives a first yellow card.
Bremen are pushing forward but Leonardo Bittencourt's finish is wide of the goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Stuttgart goal kick.
In the minute 38, It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Bremen close to the penalty box.
Bremen have been awarded a corner by Frank Willenborg.
Can Bremen get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Stuttgart's half?
In the minute 40, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Tahith Chong is booked for the home team.
Frank Willenborg signals a Stuttgart throw-in in Bremen's half.
In the minute 43, Stuttgart's Gonzalo Castro is on target but unsuccessful.
Goal kick for Bremen at Weserstadion.
1 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
In the minute 45, Throw-in Bremen.
Stuttgart have a dangerous throw-in.
Free kick for Bremen in their own half.
In the minute 45, The ref's whistle signals the end of the first-half.
The second-half is now underway.
In the minute 46, Stuttgart awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Frank Willenborg signals a Stuttgart throw-in in Bremen's half.
Stuttgart to take a throw-in in Bremen territory.
The away team have replaced Konstantinos Mavropanos with Pascal Stenzel. This is the first substitution made today by Pellegrino Matarazzo.
In the minute 47, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Ball safe as Bremen is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Can Stuttgart get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Bremen's half?
In the minute 48, In Bremen Stuttgart attack through Borna Sosa. The finish is off target, however.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Bremen.
Free kick for Bremen in their own half.
In the minute 51, Bremen awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Stuttgart in the half of Bremen.
Throw-in for Bremen at Weserstadion.
In the minute 54, Frank Willenborg signals a free kick to Bremen in their own half.
Stuttgart drives forward and Orel Mangala gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In the minute 56, Free kick Bremen.
Orel Mangala (Stuttgart) gets a yellow card.
Gonzalo Castro (Stuttgart) has received a first yellow card.
Play has been interrupted briefly in Bremen to check on Jiri Pavlenka, who is grimacing with pain.
In the minute 59, Philipp Forster is replacing Gonzalo Castro for Stuttgart at Weserstadion.
Jiri Pavlenka is back on his feet again.
Frank Willenborg signals a throw-in for Bremen, close to Stuttgart's area.
Pellegrino Matarazzo (Stuttgart) is making a third substitution, with Philipp Klement replacing Sasa Kalajdzic.
Davie Selke is replacing Leonardo Bittencourt for Bremen at Weserstadion.
In the minute 60, The home team replace Josh Sargent with Nick Woltemade.
In the minute 61, Throw-in for Bremen in their own half.
Stuttgart have a goal kick.
Frank Willenborg signals a Bremen throw-in in Stuttgart's half.
In the minute 64, Can Bremen get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Stuttgart's half?
At Weserstadion, Christian Gross has been yellow-carded for the home team.
Frank Willenborg signals a free kick to Stuttgart in their own half.
In the minute 67, Bremen's Nick Woltemade gets in a shot on goal at Weserstadion. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Stuttgart awarded a free kick in their own half.
Can Bremen capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Stuttgart's half?
In the minute 69, Bremen awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Stuttgart are coming forward and Silas Wamangituka gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Frank Willenborg awards Bremen a goal kick.
In the minute 71, Frank Willenborg awards the away team a throw-in.
Free kick for Bremen in their own half.
Bremen awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 73, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
The away team have replaced Tanguy Coulibaly with Roberto Massimo. This is the fourth substitution made today by Pellegrino Matarazzo.
Stuttgart's Silas Wamangituka gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 74, It's a goal kick for the home team in Bremen.
Tahith Chong of Bremen gets in a strike, but is off target.
Goal kick for Stuttgart at Weserstadion.
In the minute 75, At Weserstadion, Stuttgart are penalized for being offside.
Philipp Forster for Stuttgart drives towards goal at Weserstadion. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Stuttgart have been awarded a corner by Frank Willenborg.
In the minute 78, Throw-in for Bremen at Weserstadion.
Ball goes out of play for a Stuttgart goal kick.
Throw-in for Stuttgart in the half of Bremen.
In the minute 80, Florian Kohfeldt (Bremen) is making a third substitution, with Romano Schmid replacing Yuya Osako.
Bremen to take a throw-in in Stuttgart territory.
Throw-in for Stuttgart in the half of Bremen.
In the minute 84, Frank Willenborg signals a free kick to Stuttgart in their own half.
Free kick for Bremen in their own half.
Ball safe as Stuttgart is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 86, Bremen awarded a free kick in their own half.
Frank Willenborg awards Stuttgart a goal kick.
Florian Kohfeldt is making the team's fourth substitution at Weserstadion with Patrick Erras replacing Christian Gross.
In the minute 89, Corner awarded to Stuttgart.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
3 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Free kick for Stuttgart in their own half.
It's 1-2 as the referee blows for full-time.
Silas Wamangituka puts the ball in the net and the away team extend their lead. The score-line now reads 0-2.
Silas Wamangituka (Stuttgart) has received a first yellow card.
Pellegrino Matarazzo (Stuttgart) is making a fifth substitution, with Darko Churlinov replacing Silas Wamangituka.
Davie Selke is booked for the home team.
Goal! Davie Selke (Bremen) scores with a header to reduce the deficit to 1-2.
That's a fine assist from Nick Woltemade.
